angrybirds.views.objects

Class ObjectView

  • java.lang.Object
    • angrybirds.notifications.inputs.InputObservable
      • angrybirds.views.View
        • angrybirds.views.objects.ObjectView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BirdView, ObstacleView, PigView

    public abstract class ObjectView
extends View
    Cette classe représente une vue d'objet.
    Since:
    2013/10/01
    Author:
    Quentin Brault
